short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get GitHub notifications right in your browser bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss a new notification again.

Install Notify for GitHub to get live notifications right in your browser. Once you install the extension you'll need to click on the little GitHub button that appears at the top-right of your browser to connect your account.
